document_data.name: Bonecrusher
document_data.mainbody: '''Bonecrusher''' was the enchanted weapon of the spirit hunter of the [[White Worm]] tribe of [[Vaasa]].
document_data.Powers: It was a ''+3 [[maul]]'' of gigantic size.
document_data.History: In [[1359 DR]], Bonecrusher was wielded by [[Hedweck]], the current spirt hunter.
